content: **knitted hipster hat with rib in drops snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ee-706 yarn group e or c + c ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l head circumference approx 54/56 - 56/58 cm with fold piece measures approx 25 - 26 cm without fold piece measures approx 34 - 36 cm **materials** drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-150 g colour 10 bordeaux or use 150-150 g colour 85 curry 150-150 g colour 86 copper 150-150 g colour 66 sea green **knitting gauge ** 12 stitches in width and 16 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 7 mm drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 cm needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
